The Theban Necropolis, Past, Present and Future

bibl.note: 1. Preliminaries. - 2. An overview of the data from the Graeco-Roman period [pp. 179-180: The choachite archives]. - 3. Comments on specific issues. - 4. Conclusion. - Bibliography.
